nodes.bodyText: I'd prefer enum, should be faster, could be arguably more readable
I'd rather keep the configuration parameters of plugins restricted to strings. Or do you mean introduce the enum alongside the configuration only for internal handling in the plugin ?
It cannot. The value is assigned in load().
